extension.description: [B]V0.1.0[/B]: ResolveURL added. [B]SendToKodi[/B] Service for iOS Share Extension to play URL's on Kodi. Service now adds additional Resolver for finding playable video stream in webpage using script.module.resolveurl addon by jsergio123 forked from URLResolver. I use the plugin.video.resolveurl-tester as a player as it works as an easy front end to the resolveurl module. Make sure you have these two addons installed to use additional Resolving of URL's other than just YouTubeDL. These are fall back to YouTubeDL failing to find a playable video. [B]script.module.resolveurl[/B] by JSergio123 @ https://github.com/jsergio123/script.module.resolveurl [B]plugin.video.resolveurl-tester[/B] by Twilight0 @ https://github.com/Twilight0/plugin.video.resolveurl-tester SendToKodi originally by [B]firsttris[/B] modifications made by moedje. https://github.com/firsttris/
